Uses of Package
org.jclif.type

Packages that use org.jclif.type
org.jclif.parser Provides the classes necessary to parse command line inputs. 
org.jclif.runtime Provides the classes used by the framework to configure and execute commands based on parsed command line inputs and the annotated classes detected at runtime. 
org.jclif.type Provides the classes which defines the types, metadata and collections used by the framework. 
 

Classes in org.jclif.type used by org.jclif.parser
Command
          This interface defines the properties which describes a command in a command line input.
CommandLineConfiguration
          CommandLineConfiguration class is used to define the command line inputs accepted by an application.
CommandMetadata
          CommandMetadata interface defines the methods used describe the properties of a command.
OptionSet
          OptionSet class is a HashSet of Option type.
ParameterMetadata
          This interfaces defines the properties which describes a command line parameter.
ParameterParser
          ParameterValidator interface provides the methods used by the parser to support custom parameter value parsing and value validation.
ParameterSet
          This class is a collection which serves as container of all parameters parsed from a command line input.
 

Classes in org.jclif.type used by org.jclif.runtime
CommandLineConfiguration
          CommandLineConfiguration class is used to define the command line inputs accepted by an application.
InputMetadata
          InputMetadata interface defines the common properties of all command line input type.
 

Classes in org.jclif.type used by org.jclif.type
Command
          This interface defines the properties which describes a command in a command line input.
CommandConfiguration
          This class is collection class used to register all the commands supported by a command line application.
CommandLineConfiguration
          CommandLineConfiguration class is used to define the command line inputs accepted by an application.
CommandLineProperties
          This class serves as container of command line related properties used for parsing like option prefix and option-parameter character delimiter.
CommandMetadata
          CommandMetadata interface defines the methods used describe the properties of a command.
Configuration
          This class is a collection class used to store command line input configuration metadata information.
Input
          Input interface is the common interface of all command line inputs.
InputMetadata
          InputMetadata interface defines the common properties of all command line input type.
InputMetadataImpl
          This class provides concrete implementation of InputMetadata interface.
InputSet
          This class is a collection which serves as container of all input types parsed from a command line input.
Option
          Option class represents the option parsed from a command line input.
OptionConfiguration
          OptionConfiguration class serves as container of all metadata information of an applications expected command line options.
OptionMetadata
          OptionMetadata interface defines the common properties that describes a command line option.
OptionMetadata.IdentifierType
          Identifier type.
Parameter
          Parameter interface defines the common methods of a parameter.
ParameterConfiguration
          ParameterConfiguration class serves as a container of all parameters accepted by a command line input configuration.
ParameterMetadata
          This interfaces defines the properties which describes a command line parameter.
ParameterParser
          ParameterValidator interface provides the methods used by the parser to support custom parameter value parsing and value validation.
ParameterType
          ParameterType enum defines the different option parameter types supported.
